pages.text: The $(thing)Phantomstep Flower$() is a mysterious and ethereal plant that exists partially between dimensions, appearing to phase in and out of reality as it grows.$(br2)With translucent petals that seem to shift between solid and incorporeal states, this remarkable magical bloom challenges our understanding of botanical existence.

$(bold)Cultivation Notes:$()$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil infused with Blink Essence$(br)- Grows best near dimensional anomalies or End energy$(br)- Appears to shift between realities during growth$(br)- When mature, entities that step on it become temporarily incorporeal

pages.title: Phantomstep Essence Crafting
pages.text: Phantomstep Essence combines teleportation magic with the transformative nature of fire. This specialized process produces two essences using a Flame bloom surrounded by Blink essences.

pages.title: Bloom Properties
pages.text: Harvested Phantomstep blooms continue to exist partially between dimensions. Unlike Blink Flowers which enable teleportation, the Phantomstep maintains a constant semi-phased state allowing for incorporeality.

pages.title: Advanced Applications
pages.text: $(li)Temporarily phasing through solid objects without damage$(li)Creating semi-permeable magical barriers and filters$(li)Protection against physical attacks via partial incorporeality$(li)Accessing hidden or enclosed spaces without breaking barriers$(li)Performing ethereal state magical rituals$(br2)$(italic)Warning: Phantomstep magic is unpredictable and potentially dangerous if used improperly or by the inexperienced.$()
